To this day the Counter Strike franchise stays on top of the shooter genre. It's competitiveness and gameplay draw in hundreds and thousands of players all around the globe. CS:GO is a pleasure to play, especially with friends in premade teams when voice communication and coordination enables CS:GO to really shine. If you love tactical gameplay and precision shooters, CS:GO is for you!
